title: Failed to create dump file : " (error 5)
body:
I get that message every time I open the client, the client is extremely laggy in champ select as well. Running a repair did nothing.


I have the client on an SSD and am using a 6700K and GTX 980 Ti so it's not because of potato PC.

replies.body: Nothing to do about GPU... If you are using an MSI laptop stop the Nahimic program and it should work after that. At least it worked after I turned it off for some reason. Other people have had this problem in the past.
